front.abstract: The NIST Cybersecurity Framework (CSF) 2.0 can help organizations manage and reduce their cybersecurityrisks as they start or improve their cybersecurity program. The CSF outlines specific outcomes thatorganizations can achieve to address risk. Other NIST resources help explain specific actions that can betaken to achieve each outcome. This guide is a supplement to the NIST CSF and is not intended to replace it.
